description: Thoughts drift away into beautiful, peaceful emptiness

good: My mind is a blank slate for {controller}
generation.notes: Headspace is peaceful emptiness, thoughts dissolving into quiet void. Key imagery: drifting, floating, empty vessels, quiet stillness. Show the process of emptying, not just the state. Avoid clinical meditation language. Distinguishes from suggestibility (blank is emptiness, suggestibility is active absorption) and amnesia (blank is present emptiness, amnesia is losing the past).

mantras.text: {subject} enjoys feeling quiet inside
It feels good to let my thoughts go
{controller} helps my mind go blank
Being blank is natural for {subject}
I crave the feeling of a quiet mind
My thoughts drift away more easily now
{subject} needs to be empty for {controller}
My mind gets emptier every day
My mind is a blank slate for {controller}
Blank is perfect
Being empty is better
I just want to be empty
Thinking is a choice {subject} no longer makes
My nature is to be empty and receptive
Being blank defines my purpose
{controller} controls the quiet in my head
My mind is a vessel for {controller}'s thoughts
The absence of thought is my true state
{subject}'s mind is fundamentally empty now
I am consumed by a peaceful, thoughtless void
My core identity is the absence of one
There is nothing in my head but {controller}'s will
My mind is permanently blank
I exist only as an empty, receptive vessel
{subject} is forever a blank slate for {controller}
There is nothing left of me but beautiful, perfect emptiness
My mind is irreversibly empty
{subject} is blank and empty
I am becoming part of {controller}'s consciousness
There is no 'me', only the will of {controller}
